member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes
member.summary: Constants for Json Web tokens.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes.Json
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON XML data type.
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), if the value was not a string (or an enumeration of strings), the ClaimValue will serialized using the current JSON serializer, a property will be added with the .Net type and the ClaimTypeValue will be set to 'JsonClaimValueType'.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes.JsonArray
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON array XML data type.
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), if the value was not a string (or an enumeration of strings), the ClaimValue will serialized using the current JSON serializer, a property will be added with the .Net type and the ClaimTypeValue will be set to 'JsonClaimValueType'.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonClaimValueTypes.JsonNull
member.summary: A URI that represents the JSON null data type
member.remarks: When mapping json to .Net Claim(s), we use empty string to represent the claim value and set the ClaimValueType to JsonNull

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken
member.summary: A designed for representing a JSON Web Token (JWT).

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of from a string in JWS or JWE Compact serialized format.
member.param: A JSON Web Token that has been serialized in JWS or JWE Compact serialized format.
member.exception: 'jwtEncodedString' is not in JWS or JWE Compact serialization format.
member.remarks: The contents of the returned have not been validated, the JSON Web Token is simply decoded. Validation can be accomplished using the validation methods in

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class where the header contains the crypto algorithms applied to the encoded header and payload.
member.param: A string containing JSON which represents the cryptographic operations applied to the JWT and optionally any additional properties of the JWT.
A string containing JSON which represents the claims contained in the JWT. Each claim is a JSON object of the form { Name, Value }.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Actor
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'actort' claim { actort, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'actort' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Alg
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'alg' claim { alg, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'alg' claim is not found, an empty string is returned.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Audiences
member.summary: Gets the list of 'aud' claim { aud, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the 'aud' claim is not found, enumeration will be empty.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.AuthenticationTag
member.summary: Gets the AuthenticationTag from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.
member.remarks: The original JSON Compact serialized format passed into the constructor.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Ciphertext
member.summary: Gets the Ciphertext from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'jti' claim { jti, ''value' }.

member.summary: Gets the associated with this instance.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.IssuedAt
member.summary: Gets the 'value' of the 'iat' claim { iat, 'value' } converted to a assuming 'value' is seconds since UnixEpoch (UTC 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z).
member.remarks: If the 'iat' claim is not found, then is returned.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.Decode(System.String[],System.String)
member.summary: Decodes the string into the header, payload and signature.
member.param: the tokenized string.
the original token.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.DecodeJwe(System.String[])
member.summary: Decodes the payload and signature from the JWE parts.
member.param: Parts of the JWE including the header.
member.remarks: Assumes Header has already been set. According to the JWE documentation (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7516#section-2), it is possible for the EncryptedKey, InitializationVector, and AuthenticationTag to be empty strings.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.DecodeJws(System.String[])
member.summary: Decodes the payload and signature from the JWS parts.
member.param: Parts of the JWS including the header.
member.remarks: Assumes Header has already been set.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.GetClaim(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a representing the { key, 'value' } pair corresponding to the provided .
member.remarks: If the key has no corresponding value, this method will throw.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.GetPayloadValue``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the 'value' corresponding to the provided key from the JWT payload { key, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the key has no corresponding value, this method will throw.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.TryGetClaim(System.String,System.Security.Claims.Claim@)
member.summary: Tries to get the representing the { key, 'value' } pair corresponding to the provided .
member.remarks: If the key has no corresponding value, returns false. Otherwise returns true.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.TryGetPayloadValue``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Tries to get the 'value' corresponding to the provided key from the JWT payload { key, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the key has no corresponding value, returns false. Otherwise returns true.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.GetHeaderValue``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the 'value' corresponding to the provided key from the JWT header { key, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the key has no corresponding value, this method will throw.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JsonWebToken.TryGetHeaderValue``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Tries to get the value corresponding to the provided key from the JWT header { key, 'value' }.
member.remarks: If the key has no corresponding value, returns false. Otherwise returns true.

member.summary:

if unable to create a token encryption provider for the (algorithm), pair.
if encryption fails using the (algorithm), pair.
if not using one of the supported content encryption key (CEK) algorithms: 128, 384 or 512 AesCbcHmac (this applies in the case of key wrap only, not direct encryption).

member.summary: Private method for token validation, responsible for: (1) Obtaining a configuration from the . (2) Revalidating using the Last Known Good Configuration (if present), and obtaining a refreshed configuration (if necessary) and revalidating using it.
member.param: The JWS string, only to be supplied if the token is a JWS.
The outer token of the JWE, only to be supplied if the token is a JWE.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtConstants.JsonCompactSerializationRegex
member.summary: JWS - Token format: 'header.payload.signature'. Signature is optional, but '.' is required.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtConstants.JweCompactSerializationRegex
member.summary: JWE - Token format: 'protectedheader.encryptedkey.iv.cyphertext.authenticationtag'.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters
member.summary: Represents the parameters needed to decrypt a JSON Web Token

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.Alg
member.summary: Gets or sets signature algorithm that was used to create the signature.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.AuthenticationTag
member.summary: Gets or sets the AuthenticationTag from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.Ciphertext
member.summary: Gets or sets the Ciphertext from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.DecompressionFunction
member.summary: Gets or sets the function used to attempt decompression with.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.Enc
member.summary: Gets or sets the encryption algorithm (Enc) of the token.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.EncodedHeader
member.summary: Gets the EncodedHeader from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.EncodedToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the EncodedHeader from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.InitializationVector
member.summary: Gets or sets the InitializationVector from the original raw data of this instance when it was created.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.Keys
member.summary: Gets or sets the collection of s to attempt to decrypt with.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters.Zip
member.summary: Gets or sets the 'value' of the 'zip' claim.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenUtilities
member.summary: A class which contains useful methods for processing JWT tokens.

member.summary: Regex that is used to figure out if a token is in JWS format.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenUtilities.RegexJwe
member.summary: Regex that is used to figure out if a token is in JWE format.

member.summary: Produces a signature over the .
member.param: String to be signed
The that contain crypto specs used to sign the token.
member.returns: The bse64urlendcoded signature over the bytes obtained from UTF8Encoding.GetBytes( 'input' ).

member.summary: Produces a signature over the .
member.param: String to be signed
The that contain crypto specs used to sign the token.
should the be cached.
member.returns: The bse64urlendcoded signature over the bytes obtained from UTF8Encoding.GetBytes( 'input' ).

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenUtilities.DecompressToken(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Decompress JWT token bytes.
member.exception: if the decompression is not supported.
member.returns: Decompressed JWT token

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenUtilities.DecryptJwtToken(Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenValidationParameters,Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenDecryptionParameters)
member.summary: Decrypts a Json Web Token.
member.param: The Json Web Token
The validation parameters containing cryptographic material.
The decryption parameters container.
member.returns: The decrypted, and if the 'zip' claim is set, decompressed string representation of the token.

member.summary: Generates key bytes.

member.summary: Gets all decryption keys.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenUtilities.GetDateTime(System.String,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Gets the using the number of seconds from 1970-01-01T0:0:0Z (UTC)
member.param: Claim in the payload that should map to an integer, float, or string.
The payload that contains the desired claim value.
member.remarks: If the claim is not found, the function returns:
member.exception: If the value of the claim cannot be parsed into a long.
member.returns: The representation of a claim.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens.JwtTokenUtilities.ResolveTokenSigningKey(System.String,System.String,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.TokenValidationParameters,Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens.BaseConfiguration)
member.summary: Returns a to use when validating the signature of a token.
member.param: The kid field of the token being validated
The x5t field of the token being validated
A required for validation.
The that will be used along with the to resolve the signing key
member.returns: Returns a to use for signature validation.
member.remarks: If key fails to resolve, then null is returned

The x5t field of the token being validated
